page.title: 19NORTHFIELDS TUBE DEPOT
page.content:
The depot is between Boston Manor and Northfields Tube stations on the busy Piccadilly Line serving Heathrow Air- port. The 21 tracks in the depot are used for servicing, repairing and washing trains, and as an overnight garage. 77 trains leave the depot in peak periods (early morning until 09.30 and 15.30-18.30) and 62 in off- peak periods.The first staff trains leave the depot at 04.30; the last returns at 02.30. Northfields Station and Depot employ about 150 people but only one woman. About 3000 passengers use the station each day.
It sometimes suffers grafitti and torn posters, but the staff are often complimented for its cleanliness and for their friendliness. There has been only one strike (2 years ago) since 1933.
